reviewText:
If there was ever a farce made of an entertainment industry, this comedy is the best example of.

A funny sexy depicting of instantly occurring black deeds in a same block of flats is a mix of all genres cinematographic, where a homosexual hairdresser murdered hit-woman-nun, a mother of him.

About a dozen of troops substantiate this black comedy with Buddhist monk and unprofessional Special Forces involved just to laugh at the end.
